content: **please note new url silver s sock classes have moved to www kristinbelle com** one sock on four double pointed needles tutorial **if you re using ** - sock weight or fingering weight yarn - approx 420 yards and either size 2 or size 3 double pointed needles - sport or double knitting weight yarn - approx 350 yards and either size 4 or size 5 double pointed needles - worsted weight yarn - approx 285 yards and either size 6 or size 7 double pointed needles you will also need a tapestry or yarn needle a ruler or measuring tape and patience
